name: The Great Bulb
description:
IMPORTANT!!!: This game has flashing lights and loud sounds; If you are sensitive to these things, then tread lightly. They're important parts of the gameplay.

Small horror game made for a private 3 day RPG Maker Game Jam, touched on later with bug fixes and gameplay tweaks. All assets minus plugins made by me.

Controls are RPG Maker standard: Z/X & Arrow Keys

If you want to take a closer listen to the OST, then you can find a playlist here.
